roleset.name: stop, prevent

example.name: just transitive
example.text: At the same time, the government didn't want to appear to favor GM by allowing a minority stake that *trace* might preclude a full bid by Ford.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: But Mr. Smith said Sony intends to prove that the oral agreement did in fact exist , and that even the existing written contract does n't preclude the producers from taking executive posts at another studio .
example.arg: from taking executive posts at another studio

roleset.note: PRECLUDE-V NOTES: I'm not sure the latter is actually grammatical, but 'prevent'predicts it. We'll leave it in pending further examples. I alsodoubt there will/can be a separate instrument argument. (from preclude.01-v)
